thread.title: Holly Johnson
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Holly Johnson

author: Holly Johnson
title: Holly Johnson
text: Bought a Barbour savannah wax jacket and a country attire wax jacket, both is size 10. Got them next day delivery, Barbour fit perfectly, the country attire was massive on me, returned it for a size 6 and got it re-delivered in 2 days. No hassle, online chat was fantastic when I needed information on sizing. Pricing is perfect, will definitely be using Country Attire for many more years
